summary:
This mod adds 2 lurker followers.
Larry The Lurker and Fluffy.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 2 lurker followers.
Larry The Lurker and Fluffy.
their height is set to 0.50

They can be found in the Bannered Mare up by the bed. I placed them there so you can find them easily without needing to go somewhere like Apocrypha.
When I learn more about using the creation kit I might make a black book which will lead into another part of Apocrypha and I'll place them at the end of the area as a reward.

The only difference about them is their names.

Requirements-
Skyrim
Patch 1.9
Dawnguard
Dragonborn

I was going to make Vampire Lords too but I changed my mind after making the Lurkers. If I do end up making my own quest thingy I will use some Dawnguard stuff so the Dawnguard requirement isn't pointless. I just need to find some good YouTube tutorials for creating places.
author: Mkenny95
